channel.title: Python Projects on Tanay Kashyap
channel.description: Recent content in Python Projects on Tanay Kashyap

item.title: Python Project: Analyzing a Youtube channel using Streamlit
item.description: In this project we built a dashboard using Streamlit for analyzing a Youtube channel. We made the dashboard to analyze the entire Youtube channel as well as individual videos. After building the dashboard we also successfully published it online using Share by Streamlit feature. This is an interactive dashboard which can help you design the same for your Youtube channel. The data we used was sourced from Kaggle. We analyzed Ken Jee’s Youtube channel and presented the statistics to visualize the data.

item.title: Python Project: Predicting hotel booking cancellations
item.description: In this project, we built a machine learning model to predict whether or not a customer cancelled a hotel booking. We will use a dataset on hotel bookings from the article “Hotel booking demand datasets”, published in the Elsevier journal, Data in Brief. The abstract of the article states This data article describes two datasets with hotel demand data. One of the hotels (H1) is a resort hotel and the other is a city hotel (H2).
